verses.name: John 4:1
verses.text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,

verses.name: John 4:2
verses.text: (Though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples,)

verses.name: John 4:3
verses.text: He left Judea, and departed again into Galilee.

verses.name: John 4:4
verses.text: And he must needs go through Samaria.

verses.name: John 4:5
verses.text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria, which is called Sychar, near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph.

verses.name: John 4:6
verses.text: Now Jacob’s well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with his journey, sat thus on the well: and it was about the sixth hour.
